title: Managing e- trading company in the age of the new economy: the ideal e-trading application at PT XYZ
abstract: The birth o f the New Economy produces a new way o f doing business, so-called E-Commerce, which utilizes the Internet to facilitate the transaction PT XYZ as an international trading company also adopts the technology, which promises integrated operation and wider market access. However, the theory is not always applicable to all companies. This report uses comparative descriptive analysis and historical research method to analyze the ideal implementation of e-trading at PT XYZ and the key success factors of a trading company in the age o f New Economy. The data used in this analysis are articles, publications and interviews as well as observation at PT XYZ. Finally, the analysis produces the ideal E-Trading implementation model of PT XYZ and the key success factors of a trading company, which are applicable towards the nature o f the company.
contributors: Ricky Wang (Advisor 1); Richard Von Llewelyn (Examination Committee 1)
source: Undergraduate Thesis No. 0006/ IB M / 2003; Devi Handriyani (34499041)
subjects: ELECTRONIC COMMERCE; ELECTRONIC TRADING OF SECURITIES; INTERNATIONAL TRADE
